name: The Amalgamate Curse
description:
Rogue Like Top Down Shooter where health, ammo and time are one shared resource. Upgrades and new weapons make your play through unique every time, some runs may be more challenging and some runs will have you running and gunning without a care in the world. Your constantly lose health and every bullet you shoot hurts you, so aim well.

This game employs scaling difficulty. As time goes on health drops decrease, early game health drops are very plentiful so it's very easy after you get a foothold. After roughly 1 hour the game becomes next to impossible.

Known issues: 

-Player death animation
-Harsh bullet sound
-Enemies occasionally getting stuck / teleporting

If you find any bugs or have suggestions please let us know in the comments, thanks!
